article_text:
Harry Rowen, a Cold Warrior, died late last week in California, where for many years he was a senior fellow at the Hoover Institution. We identify Harry prominently as a Cold Warrior because the members of his generation who helped the U.S. contest the Soviet Union’s global claims in the postwar period are passing from view. It is important not only to remember these individuals but also the substance of their role.

Harry Rowen was an insider. He moved from the RAND Corporation in the 1960s into the Defense Department....

twitter.description: A eulogy for Henry S. Rowen, a Cold Warrior who helped defeat the Soviets, the Wall Street Journal writes in an editorial.
twitter.title: Henry S. Rowen
